message.content:
You need to fix broken Amazon ASINs in the products-registry.ts file for SUPPLEMENTS category products. The current ASINs are showing "Sorry! We couldn't find that page" on Amazon.

The file is at: /Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/data/guides/products-registry.ts

Products to fix (lines ~496-724):
1. creatine_mono - Optimum Nutrition Creatine Monohydrate (current ASIN: B002DYIZEO)
2. vitamin_d3_k2 - Sports Research Vitamin D3+K2 (current ASIN: B01N5P3E9X)
3. magnesium_glycinate - Doctor's Best Magnesium Glycinate (current ASIN: B000BD0RT0)
4. omega3_fish_oil - Nordic Naturals Omega-3 Fish Oil (current ASIN: B002CQU564)
5. collagen_peptides - Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides (current ASIN: B00K9XZTW0)
6. ashwagandha_ksm66 - NOW Foods Ashwagandha KSM-66 (current ASIN: B01D0YJAD8)
7. zinc_picolinate - Thorne Zinc Picolinate 30mg (current ASIN: B000FGWDQS)
8. vitamin_c_liposomal - LivOn Labs Vitamin C Liposomal (current ASIN: B000CD9XGC)
9. melatonin_lowdose - Life Extension Melatonin 0.5mg (current ASIN: B001LXOHCE)
10. l_theanine - NOW Foods L-Theanine 200mg (current ASIN: B0013OQEO0)
11. protein_powder - Optimum Nutrition Whey Protein Isolate (current ASIN: B000QSNYGI)
12. nmn_supplement - ProHealth Longevity NMN 250mg (current ASIN: B08QRYWLF9)

For each product:
1. Use WebSearch to find the correct Amazon ASIN for the exact product
2. Verify the ASIN format is 10 characters (alphanumeric starting with B0)
3. Update the products-registry.ts file with the correct ASIN

content.text: I'll search for the correct Amazon ASINs for each supplement product and update the registry file.

## Life Extension Low-Dose Melatonin Products on Amazon

### 500 mcg (0.5 mg) Option
The Life Extension low-dose option contains 500 mcg of melatonin per vegetarian capsule. The Amazon ASIN for this product is **B004FG5JAG**.

- **Product:** Life Extension Melatonin, 500 mcg – Gently Promotes Sleep, Low Dose, Value Size – Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Vegetarian – 200 Capsules
- **URL:** https://www.amazon.com/Life-Extension-Melatonin-Vegetarian-Capsules/dp/B004FG5JAG

- At 500 mcg of melatonin per vegetarian capsule, this is one of their low-dose melatonin formulas for gentle sleep support.

### Other Low-Dose Options from Life Extension

1. **300 mcg (0.3 mg)** - ASIN: **B000X9QZZ2**
   - This 300 mcg sleep supplement promotes healthy sleep-wake patterns, promotes falling asleep, and encourages the duration and quality of your sleep.

2. **300 mcg Timed Release (6 Hour)** - ASIN: **B00CDABRUW**
   - By releasing 300 mcg of melatonin over an extended period of time, this Melatonin 6 Hour Timed Release formula makes it easier for you to fall asleep and stay asleep.(no content)Life Extension recommends: "When taking a sleep supplement like melatonin, start at a low dosage and gradually increase your melatonin dose until you get to the milligram level that is right for you."

Note: Life Extension offers melatonin formulas with as little as 300 mcg to as strong as 10 mg—with many different dosing options in between.

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)

    isBaseStack: false,
  },
];

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

toolUseResult.originalFile:
/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================

    isBaseStack: false,
  },
];

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

    isBaseStack: false,
  },
];

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

    isBaseStack: false,
  },
];

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**

const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

    isBaseStack: false,
  },
];

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { Product } from '@/types/results';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

// ============================================
// LEGACY ADAPTER FUNCTIONS
// Converts GuideProduct to legacy Product format for backwards compatibility
// with product-recommendations.ts, daily-stack.ts, and recommendations/products.ts
// ============================================

/**
 * Category mapping from GuideProduct categories to legacy Product categories
 */
const CATEGORY_MAP: Record<string, Product['category']> = {
  'hygiene': 'general',
  'grooming': 'tools',
  'skincare': 'skin',
  'miscellaneous': 'tools',
  'supplements': 'general',
  'hair': 'hair',
  'beard': 'tools',
  'teeth': 'dental',
  'kbeauty': 'skin',
  'hormonal': 'hormonal',
  'surgery': 'general',
};

/**
 * Converts a GuideProduct to legacy Product format
 * Uses US region link as the default affiliate link
 */
export function toLegacyProduct(product: GuideProduct): Product {
  return {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    brand: product.brand || 'Generic',
    category: CATEGORY_MAP[product.category] || 'general',
    affiliateLink: product.regionLinks.us || product.directLink || '#',
    affiliateType: product.directLink ? 'direct' : 'amazon',
    supplementId: product.supplementId || product.id,
    priority: product.priority * 5, // Scale 1-3 to roughly match old 5-15 scale
    baseStackItem: product.isBaseStack,
    description: product.description,
  };
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductById(id: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = getGuideProductById(id);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get legacy Product by supplement ID (backwards compatible with product_db.ts)
 */
export function getLegacyProductBySupplementId(supplementId: string): Product | undefined {
  const product = GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
  return product ? toLegacyProduct(product) : undefined;
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyBaseStackProducts(): Product[] {
  return getBaseStackProducts().map(toLegacyProduct);
}

/**
 * Get all products in legacy format
 */
export function getLegacyProducts(): Product[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.map(toLegacyProduct);
}
